author: samajammin
content:
Hey folks! We just had our ethereum.org sprint planning meeting yesterday & our main focus is the "Eth2 rebrand": https://www.notion.so/efdn/Eth2-rebrand-ethereum-org-a799a4dbbcc14a0a94ad913206ecdb65

Our team has committed to shipping updates on this by the end of the month & we'd appreciate content reviews from you folks if you have capacity! I can share preview deploys here as they become ready. Thanks in advance!

author: samajammin
content:
Related to this, <@!397809066115727383> created a PR to update our client docs to add consensus clients: https://github.com/ethereum/ethereum-org-website/pull/5064

We'd appreciate any feedback on this! Feel free to comment or suggest changes directly in the PR.
